00046     public function GetWebIconAsSpriteFrame() {
00047         $webIcon = $this->GetWebIcon();
00048         if($webIcon == '') {
00049             throw new Exception('No web icon!');
00050         }
00051         $webIconBase = $this->GetWebIconBase();
00052         $webIconAnimationString = $this->GetWebIconAnimationString();
00053         if($webIconBase == '') {
00054             $webIconBase = 0;
00055         }
00056         if($webIconAnimationString == '') {
00057             $webIconAnimationString = 0;
00058         }
00059         if(($position = strpos($webIconAnimationString,' ')) !== false) {
00060             $webIconAnimationString = substr($webIconAnimationString,0,$position);
00061         }
00062         $prayfile = $this->GetPrayFile();
00063         if($prayfile == null) {
00064             throw new Exception('No PRAY file to get the icon from!');
00065         }
00066         $iconBlock = $prayfile->GetBlockByName($webIcon);
00067         if($iconBlock->GetType() != 'FILE') {
00068             throw new Exception('The block with the web icon\'s filename is not a file block!');
00069         }
00070         $type = strtolower(substr($webIcon,-3));
00071         $icon = null;
00072         if($type == 'c16') {
00073             $icon = new C16File(new StringReader($iconBlock->GetData()));
00074         } else if($type == 's16') {
00075             $icon = new S16File(new StringReader($iconBlock->GetData()));
00076         }
00077         if($icon == null) {
00078             throw new Exception('For one reason or another, couldn\'t make a sprite file for the web icon.');
00079         }
00080         return $icon->GetFrame($webIconBase+$webIconAnimationString);
00081         
00082     }
00083     
00084 }
